Reviews.Title: “B206 rocks!”
Reviews.Author: Rigo M
Reviews.Content: We had 4 of us in our group, and B206 accomidated us perfectly. Plenty of room, beautiful lawn and private beach. Location was great, and within walking distance to nearby grocery stores, and Kaanapali beach. We could here the ocean all night, and watch the whales breach, and the turtles feeding each morning. We are already booked for next year, and can't wait. The worst part of the trip was the fact that the building was being painted at the time which caused more noise than we would like on our relaxing vacation. The best vacation we have ever had and worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably priced condo exceeds expectations”
Reviews.Author: motherHEncinitas
Reviews.Content: I found this condo online and booked it through Chasin' Rainbows management. I'm traveling with my teenaged daughter and her friend and figured I'd take the pull out and give them the bedroom. I worried about having to go through the bedroom to use the bathroom so I was pleasantly surprised to find the bathroom had another entrance through the hall way. I've slept on some pretty dismal pull outs before. This one was fall better, however it wouldn't serve more than one adult well...a couple of children, maybe. The condo is super quiet. We only hear the ocean, not other guests. Lovely grass area by the pool and sandy beach (complexes on either side of Hale Mahina only have a tiny strip of sand). It is a pretty small complex so distance between car and door is short. Stairs and elevator are available. We couldn't be happier with anything about this condo. Great value. Nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location!”
Reviews.Author: Vstins
Reviews.Content: I am writing this sippingy last cup of kona coffee on the lanai before we head home :( what a great place to stay. Ocean front, with a great beach to play at all day, tons of turtles and every morning Incan watch the whales while eating breakfast. We stayed in one of the loft suites and it had everything we needed! You can not beat the value. You would be paying triple for this view and this beach at any other bigger fancier resort! I can not wait to bring the family back here again!

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina A305 the "Seashell Condo" is top notch”
Reviews.Author: Brandyshire
Reviews.Content: Hale Mahina condo is small, quiet, friendly, and well maintained. Larry, the manager keeps the grounds impeccably groomed. We have stayed in several units in this complex and A305 has been the best by far. The new owners are helpful and the unit has been updated with fresh paint. The bed is extremely comfortable and bedside lamps are ample for reading. The kitchen is well equipped and attention has been give to details. Not only is there the requisite snorkel gear, but also, sand chairs, frozen gel packs, and an insulated picnic bag. Enjoy the sunset from the lanai of A305-the Seashell condo.

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina Beach Resort A405 is Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Don B
Reviews.Content: My wife, two children and I just got back from Maui and we felt like we really got lucky with this condo unit. Snorkeling, boogy boarding and a great private beach only seconds from the unit. Very nice grounds area with pool and hot tub overlooking the ocean. The unit itself was very clean, functional and comfortable. From the lanai we saw countless whales breaching, sea turtles swimming alongside the beach out front and the most amazing sunsets I have ever witnessed. Hale Mahina was great for the kids, they had a tons of fun in the pool area and on the beach daily. We definitely will be going back to Hale Mahina A405.

Reviews.Title: “A-406; The Fish Condo”
Reviews.Author: Carl N
Reviews.Content: WOW, WOW, WOW!! This unit has it all - recently updated (very tasteful), fully stocked kitchen supplies, comfy beds, beach gear, and the best beach/ocean view! See http://www.the fishcondo.com for all the details. They also have a nice supply of tour books - Maui Revealed is the best one. Use it. Don't look any further as this is a great bang for the buck. We stayed a week with a family of 6 and had a blast. The grounds are impeccably kept. Use one of the several charcoal grills by the pool and enjoy the view while sipping a cold one. I will definitely stay here again. Here's a tip - when you fly into Kahului, stop by the Costco (cheapest by far on the island) and get your groceries for the week. It's on the left side of the road (Hwy 380) about 1-2 miles past the airport. Trust me, do it now! Also, use Trilogy Sailing Charters for your snorkeling trip to Molokini. You pay a bit more, but it's worth it and it's first class. Book a week ahead of time on their web site at http://www.sailtrilogy.com/ for a special discount, they also offer a 10% AAA discount.

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina B403 Very Good Value”
Reviews.Author: TomSedory
Reviews.Content: Location is good, walkable to small shops. Right on beach, though heavy gate between building and beach is bothersome. Pool and hot tub not crowded though pool needs heater. Beach small but interesting with sea turtles feeding each evening. This unit has little road noise. Unit overall very nice with open 2 story loft fee and balcony over looking pool and ocean. Kitchen lacks some basics - we had to buy sugar, oil, foil, coffee filters, briquettes, lighter fluid. Outside building looks tired now but currently getting painted so may look refreshed soon. The price for this unit is very good value considering all Hawaii is over priced.

Reviews.Title: “It's nice”
Reviews.Author: Hola4876
Reviews.Content: We recently spent several days at Hale Mahina. The grounds are clean, the condo we rented was also clean; the kitchen was well-supplied. There is a beach, albeit somewhat rocky - bring or buy water shoes. In comparison to neighboring condos, this one is better in that it does have an accessible beach. One thing we didn't like is that a key is needed to get to the beach, the pool, or the grills. The gate is heavy & is bothersome if carrying beverages or food. We did not notice any road noise (another reviewer) but did note on our last couple days that the people who had just arrived often smoked on their balcony and the smoke came into our condo. If you are planning to use the grills, as noted by another reviewer, they are frequently busy so be patient if you have to wait or have an alternate plan, such as using your oven.

Reviews.Title: “The Fish Condo is great!”
Reviews.Author: vilainebvr
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Fish Condo was awesome! I have been disappointed in VRBO rentals in the past, mainly because the photos were better than the reality. That is not the case with this property. The photos have not been staged; it really is as good as the photos! The place is immaculate, the view is unbeatable, and the beach is awesome! The kitchen has everything you need (and more); it is like cooking at home. Nice towels and linens...even all the beach toys you would want. While it isn't really walking distance to many restaurants, it is very conveniently located. The owners were very helpful in answering our questions before we arrived and we knew exactly what to bring and how to get there. The grounds are very impressive; well kept and beautiful. Every morning we would see the caretaker clean the pool and hot tub. The beach is wonderful...nice sand...and never crowded. Not only will we recommend this place to friends; we plan to return to the Fish Condo.

Reviews.Title: “Family-like atmosphere but somewhat noisy”
Reviews.Author: GiaFH
Reviews.Content: The property in itself is located on a very nice beach spot, and holds a private beach (even if there are no real private beaches on Maui, anybody is allowed to enter which ever beach they like). The beach however most often holds only guests staying at Hale Mahina. Most of the people we met during our almost two week stay, were extremely nice, and since we were staying at Christmas time, we were even asked to join for Christmas celebration. The beach is nice, you can choose from either hanging on the grass or in the sand. Often sea turtles crawl on the beach and you can go in the water to swim with them. Snorkeling can be done right outside. On specific times of the year you can see whales dancing in the water straight from your terrace / the beach. And the sunsets are to be enjoyed with a glass of wine from the beach as well. They are amazing. There is a barbecue next to the beach, adn people gather there in the evening. The pool is quite nice and especially the jacuzzi section of it is in frequent use. If you are eager to get to know others, in the evening there are usually other guests hanging in the jacuzzi as well. The condo we had was very clean and nice, but the noise from the outside street was overwhelming. We chose to sleep in the living room, since it had a big bed sofa, and it didn't bother us to do so. But the noise from the passing cars was way too much. When sleeping on the other side of the condo, you got to fall asleep to the sound of the ocean waves and wake up to them as well. Strong recommendations to have a morning picnic by the beach to enjoy the beautiful sunrise. You might be surprised with double or even triple rainbows while doing it. The view is magnificent! While staying in Hale Mahina, you will need to have a car or other transportation, since it is quite some miles to get in to Lahaina. There is a small, organic Farmers Market close by (which will even serve you any gluten free things if you happen to need them), absolutely great fresh fruits, smoothies, and anything healthy but delicious. The public transportation offers rides from the Farmers Market to Lahaina, but doesn't go often. You can also rent surfboards and snorkeling gear from the shop next to the Farmers Market. If you stay at Maui, go and see Haleakala, take a trip with the car in the north of the island for excellent views & small hidden waterfalls, visit many beaches in the Kihei/Wailea -area and enjoy the cozy atmosphere in Lahaina city in especially at dinner time. The scuba diving in the waters close to the national park is clearer then seen anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “The Fish Condo A-406 at Hale Mahina-my favorite condo on Maui”
Reviews.Author: Judy C
Reviews.Content: I have been to Maui many times, and the Fish Condo (A-406) at Hale Mahina is my very favorite place to stay. It truly feels like a "home away from home" with comfortable and beautiful furniture and beds, everything you need for the beach (towels, toys, boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach chairs), everything you need in the kitchen, plus the ocean is just steps away (I don't have THAT in Minnesota!). There are so many special touches: wonderful bedding, books to read, wi-fi, widescreen TV, nice toiletries in the bathrooms, a laundry in the condo (and laundry detergent is provided). No air conditioning means you have the windows open for the cooling ocean breezes, and you can always hear the surf. The sunsets are spectacular, and the turtles are often swimming just off the beach. The condo has a great location-close to Lahaina, a farmer's market, and grocery store. Linda, the owner, is so gracious and accomodating, and everything is spotless (thanks to Rose, the cleaning person.) So often, I arrive at a hotel or condo, only to be disappointed when the photos look much better than the reality, and the items that the owner promised would be there aren't there. The Fish Condo is more fantastic than it looks online, and if Linda says it's there-it is there! Because some of the units are owner occupied, it is probably not the best choice for very active kids or for those who want to have rowdy parties, but my husband and I hope that we never have to stay anywhere else on Maui!

Reviews.Title: “A-406 The Fish Condo, The Perfect 10 days in Paradise!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Starryeyed25
Reviews.Content: When booking our trip to Maui I was overwhelmed with how many condo's were available. The Hale Mahina caught my interest and the reviews were great so I looked into "The Fish Condo" and I was hooked! Linda was ever so helpful with getting it all booked and sending out cd's with Hawaiian music were just a magical touch..Mahalo Linda!! Now onto the condo itself...and if I were to choose one word it would be PERFECT!! We arrived late at night and were welcomed to a beautiful space and the beds and pillows..oh wow they were fantastic! My daughter even loved the sofa-bed! My mom loved her bedroom so much and never once felt too hot. ( and I was worried about no AC , but it was not missed at all) The amenities that were provided are so welcomed after staying in hotels that lack in that "homey" feeling. Now the best part, the view. I can't even begin to describe the sunsets we saw right from our lanai. Plus the turtles swimming in front of the private beach everyday..this really was paradise. The ocean was so beautiful and my daughter loved swimming right until sunset in it. ( make sure you have water shoes, there is coral and rocks out there!) We met Larry the caretaker a few times and he was so sweet and friendly, so I'm not too sure what people are complaining about. You have to realise that some people live here, this is their paradise and some have worked hard to earn this sanctuary and you have to respect that and keep the noise down. I wouldn't recommend this to a family that has a lot of children just for this reason. Better off staying at a resort that is ok with children splashing in the pool with water noodles, screaming at the top of their lungs. The location was perfectly central for all we had planned, and the grounds were immaculate. We hit the hot tub a few nights and really enjoyed the sounds of the surf while doing so. I could I would love to return one day, it truly is a wonderful place to stay while on Maui. It might have spoiled me for hotels now! If your even considering this condo, just book it! All though with all these good reviews you might have trouble finding a week that's available!! ; ) On a side note, my daughter forgot her ipod there and Rose the cleaning found it, and contacted Linda and are mailing in back to me. You wont get that in hotel!! Mahalo!!

Reviews.Title: “Our Maui home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: SouthOzzies
Reviews.Content: We were visiting Maui with friends for the first time and stayed in one of the 3 bedroom penthouses. The condo exceeded our expectations in all areas, it was huge, very clean and homely, and had everything we needed for our weeks stay. The views from the lanai were simply magnificent. many an hour was spent watching turtles, rainbows and sunsets. The beach at the front of the resort is very safe for swimming. The complex is a mix of permanents and holiday rentals, but was very quiet.There are shops within walking distance of the resort, but it would be advisable to have a car if staying here. If we get the opportunity to return to Maui, we will definately be staying at the Hale Mahina.

Reviews.Title: “Unit A405 is the perfect vacation spot!”
Reviews.Author: Zgardengrl
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a beautiful and serene place to relax look no further! This well appointed condo has it all including snorkel equipment, beach chairs, coolers and BBQ necessities. The 4th floor location at the beautiful Hale Mahina offers breathtaking ocean and sunset views. The private beach right in front of the complex is perfect for snorkeling and turtle sightings. The Hale Mahina complex is always beautifully landscaped and a clean lounge chair is always available. The kitchen has everything you'll need to cook up a gourmet meal or if you'd rather go out there are many restaurants within a 5 or 10 minute drive. The unit was spotless when we arrived and the owner is always just a quick email away.

Reviews.Title: “We loved the Fish Condo!”
Reviews.Author: Anna N
Reviews.Content: We stayed in The Fish Condo A-406. It is decorated beautifully and very well stocked. We really appreciated the small things like detergent being provided! I was concerned about the lack of air conditioning but we were cool at night and the temperature during the day could not have been nicer. The beach was nice and perfect for snorkeling. We saw several turtles. The waves were fine for my 7 year old and enough to boogie board for my teenagers. The pool was nice but we stayed on the beach most of the time. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Excape from the world”
Reviews.Author: mauitrip2011
Reviews.Content: Took our daughter to Maui for her graduation present. It was a wonderful vacation. The condo complex is private and quiet and so well maintained. Property manager was very friendly. Condo is well equiped and the beds are more comfy than home. Wake to the sounds and view of the ocean from loft bedroom was simply heavenly. You will not be disappointed. Saw turtles everyday.

Reviews.Title: “Stay in The Fish Condo (Hale Mahina A406)--you'll love it!!”
Reviews.Author: SzarekFamily
Reviews.Content: If you are planning a trip to Maui and looking to stay in a condo directly on the beach, I can't think of a better place than The Fish Condo. My family (me, my husband, and two young daughters) stayed there for a week in July. I wish we could have stayed longer. This condo was plenty big for our family and was fully equipped with every thing we could possibly imagine. The beds are truly heavenly with top of the line linens. We slept very comfortably. It was well into the 80's while we were there and we were never hot...even without AC. There is a great breeze and fans throughout the unit. The unit has a phenomenal view of the ocean. We enjoyed many meals out on the balcony. The sunsets were amazing and we also saw many rainbows. The owners of the unit were easy to work with. We met the resident managers, Larry and Lynn, while there. They were very nice as well. Larry does a great job keeping the g rounds immaculate. We can whole heartedly recommend The Fish Condo.

Reviews.Title: “It was not up to standards”
Reviews.Author: mauited
Reviews.Content: A-302,, Toilet handle came off, shower head blew off. The light in the bedroom had no shade and would wiggle and blow out. Wall paper in bath peeling, very worn toilet seat, The fan switch in the bedroom did not work.The couch was fadded and worn, carpet had stains, entry rug was yuk. Kitchen counter was coming up. The out side was very nice and well kept up.There is a lot of roard noise.I called the rental firm, they said they would call the owner. We have been coming once a year since 1962 and this is the worse i have ever seen. The view was super, and pool super clean.

Reviews.Title: “The aloha spirit is alive at Hale Mahina!”
Reviews.Author: SamanthaZ
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a relaxing and wonderful place to stay on Maui - Hale Mahina is the place! My husband and I stayed there in July, and we will definitely return. There isn't a more beautiful location anywhere in the world. The small private beach is perfect, and you can see turtles every day. The pool and spa have an ocean view, are clean, and were always open until 10 P.M. The manager does an amazing job with the grounds. It seems like he's always outside watering, trimming, or sweeping the lush foliage and lawn area. We used the barbeques and ocean front tables on several occasions. Everyone we met there was delightful. The manager and his wife especially made us feel welcome. They gave us suggestions for places to visit, restaurants to eat, and one night, Larry even helped us barbeque. I can't imagine a better vacation. After staying at Hale Mahina, we feel like we truly experienced the spirit of Hawaiian aloha.

Reviews.Title: “A-406 Awsome condo!”
Reviews.Author: Dawn3664
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here many times over the years and we have found this to be the best two bedroom that we have stayed at! Beautifully decorated and the kitchen was well stocked with all the cooking items you will need and plenty of spices. The beds are super cozy and the condo was very clean and stocked with shampoo/conditioner even qtips! The only drawbacks is the downstairs bedroom is on the street side and you get some road noise and the property managers are intollarant of small children and noise in general. Its getting worse over the years.... time to retire guys. We would recommend this resort it has great snorkeling right out front and the grounds are beautifully maintained, pictures dont do this place justice. Just go and see for yourself!

Reviews.Title: “A-406 The Fish Condo”
Reviews.Author: Paula52024
Reviews.Content: The Fish Condo (Unit A-406) in the Hale Mahina Beach Resort is wonderful. The decor is nice, it is well stocked with supplies, the beds are very comfortable, and best of all the view from the lanai is amazing. The owners were easy to work with and very responsive. Being on the top floor of the complex provided a bit more privacy and feeling of security. The condo complex is small and very well maintained, plus it has a private beach with barbeque pits and a pool. A reef is close to the beach where a few turtles like to hang out. The condo complex is in a great location and is within walking distance of a farmer's market. My family and I hope to stay here again if we get the opportunity to return to Maui.

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation EVER!!”
Reviews.Author: MauiCanton
Reviews.Content: This is our second time staying at the Hale Mahina. We love it and can't wait to come back. The beach is great! We snorkeled with turtles a few times. The grounds are well maintained and it's great for laying by the ocean. We just tried the pool today and it was great too. No complaints, can't wait to return!

Reviews.Title: “A405 is a winner”
Reviews.Author: 1SouthsideGirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the week of Memorial Day and it was awesome. The condo is extremely clean, beds are comfy, and it is well appointed with towels, paper products, cooking equipment, beach chairs, etc. It was wonderful to go to sleep to and awaken to the sound of the ocean waves. Sea turtles just off shore, gorgeous grounds, barbeques, and a good location. Ten-minute walk to a great farmers market, 15 minutes to a grocery (five minutes by car), lots of nearby options for lunch (we ate breakfast and dinner at the condo to save big bucks). Excellent snorkeling five to ten minutes away (we didn't have much luck at the beach on site but the water was a little rough that week). Well worth the stay. Owner is extremely accessible and responsive; this is a great place and I would recommend it to anyone wanting space, comfort, and beauty. Several mornings we saw double rainbows from our lanai. Can't beat the sunsets... Thank you very much, Beth!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Vacation.”
Reviews.Author: Nevlach
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned from our Honeymoon in Maui. We decided to go with a condo instead of a big fancy hotel and we're both happy that we made that decision. The condo was on the third floor and had an amazing view of the private little beach and ocean. The beach was awesome, very quiet, and had great snorkeling. I saw many fish there and a couple eels as well. The pool was also really clean and while not an overly fancy pool it was refreshing to jump into. The condo itself (room A305) was kept really clean and it was perfect for lounging around in and relaxing. Yes, there was no AC, but with the big screen window open a nice cool breeze came in off the ocean at all times. The kitchen was also very clean, we enjoyed doing some cooking together there, and it was just really convenient to have. The bedroom and bathrooms were also very clean. You could hear the traffic at night but it wasn't really bad or anything. I'm generally a light sleeper but never had any problem falling asleep despite hearing some vehicles going by when I would go to bed. The free parking was nice as well. Overall I would definitely recommend staying in this condo and I fully plan on going back there in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Like home!”
Reviews.Author: J0ri
Reviews.Content: We loved this place. Just in front of a small private beach. Even inside the Fish condo, it was as if we were on the beach! A beautiful view. Everything you need! The condo was well decorated, with small details. We recommend this place. We had an excellent service. The owners will call you right away if you need help.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it.”
Reviews.Author: BJLitt
Reviews.Content: The beach is wonderful. It is shallow for quite a ways out and good for wading or swimming. One part of the beach has coral and I enjoyed snorkeling and seeing beautifully colored fish and sea turtles. From the beach we could usually watch the large sea turtles occasionally pop their heads up for air. The grounds are well kept and the manager is often outside watering the plants with by hose. Both he and the security/housecleaning staff person were very friendly and helpful. There is no air conditioning but with the top windows open it was quite comfortable even on hot days. The condo was simple but very adequate and nicely kept. Our unit was on the ground floor and the bedroom wall was on the other side of the sidewalk - there was quite a bit of noise that came into the bedroom from the sidewalk and street. The bed was fine but a bit softer than we like. We liked being on the ground floor because we could simply walk out the back door to the beautiful beach which was about 75 feet away. All in all we loved the condo, especially because of the beach, the friendly staff, and the well kept grounds.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful vacation condo!”
Reviews.Author: McKristin
Reviews.Content: We had such a wonderful time. The condo was so perfectly clean and comfortable. The view is spectacular as well. Our first day we saw a rainbow and watched the whales right off of the patio! We also watched the turtles in the area. The private beach and pool were just right for us and they are also immaculately kept. The location is close to fun things to do as well. Most days we would spend the morning exploring and the afternoon at the beach and pool. So quiet and relaxing. That is what we liked best. This condo is private and we weren't exposed to mobs of people all of the time. We will definitely be back. Thank you Linda!

Reviews.Title: “Stay in the fish condo!!”
Reviews.Author: msfraser
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay in A406 aka "The Fish Condo". We couldn't have asked for more. It was so homey and filled with everything we could have possibly needed for a vacation on the beach. I almost forgot I wasn't in my own home, it was so comfortable. We were with a few other families with lots of small children and we had no problems with any of the tenants or the grounds manager, as one earlier review stated. If you're headed to Maui definitely stay here. You're in a great location, close to lahaina and shopping and restaurants. You have a perfect little beach right in front of you that other places simply can't compete with.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to bring your kids”
Reviews.Author: theGrays3
Reviews.Content: Hale Mahina has been our place to stay in Maui for years now. Our son was small when we started coming, and is now 16. We are leaving today and as look down at the pool from A405 he is swimming with 2 other 16 year old boys he met here, I see nothing but kids having a good time with each other and their parents. There are little kids on the grass, on the beach and in the ocean all with their families. Hale Mahina is a great place to stay where everyone appears to have a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Location....Intolerant Manager”
Reviews.Author: 60878Kelly69
Reviews.Content: The location of this complex is perfect. If you have small children or teenagers forget it. Not family friendly at all. Larry and his wife are more like wardens than caretakers. They yell at the kids in the pool for the smallest things and I saw with another family's teenagers (who were well behaved) they overstepped their authority and acted heavy handed...saying things like they were going to call the police if they didn't wash their feet before getting in the pool. As a result our kids and the other family felt on edge. It was ridiculous and ruined our vacation. They seemed to forget that we are paying guests. I found on Trip Advisor a few similar complaints. When some of his relatives children came over, they could behave any way they wanted. This place is only good for older people or people without children.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal place to stay in West Maui. We'll be back for sure.”
Reviews.Author: ADog2
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Fish Condo made for wonderful accomodations. We appreciated the lovely decor, well equipped kitchen and stash of beach toys, and fantastic beachfront location! We've rented a number of condos in Hawaii and this was definitely the nicest!

Reviews.Title: “We loved Unit B206 so much we are going back”
Reviews.Author: beachluvver
Reviews.Content: I chose Unit B206 after a lot of research, because I wanted an oceanfront unit during the whale watching season that didn't break the bank. Unit B206 at Hale Mahina seemed to offer the amenities and location I wanted. It turned out to be a great choice. The unit was really comfortable without being overly modern. Even without any refurbishment we found it catered for all our needs. The washer/drier was excellent, the stove had a halogen hob , which was very welcome as I hate the old fashioned metal rings. The oven worked well, as did the microwave and dishwasher. The bed was really comfortable, as was the living room furniture, which includes a bed settee. I noticed the sound of traffic on the first night along with the sound of the waves, but from then on I only heard the waves. I also found that the fabulous breeze blowing through the slats, rather than having air conditioning, improved my sleep hugely. The balcony is really large and we spent many happy hours looking out at the ocean and spotting the whales. They don't come in very close but can still be watched easily through binoculars and decent camera lenses. There are, however, plenty of turtles to watch as they live just off the beach and can meet you face to face if you snorkel there. We really liked the fact that the unit is at the end of the building and was very quiet and private because no-one walked past it on the way to other units. The one problem we had was the fact that the toaster wasn't working but we emailed the owners and it was replaced within a few hours. If I could change one thing it would be to be able to pay the rental by PayPal or Credit Card, but that is a minor quibble. The swimming pool has a hot tub attached, which is not the case in many local resorts, and was another factor in deciding which resort to book. Although there are 4 barbecues on site, only two have their lids. At least one more barbecue with a lid would be helpful, as there was often a bit of a hiatus waiting for the early birds to finish their cooking on the two BBQs with lids, and a lidless BBQ is not ideal. However, we sometimes just ate a little later than we might have done. There are plenty of shops within striking distance, including 2 large supermarkets within 5-10 minutes drive, and with the facilities available we ate in nearly every night. As far as the residents and guests are concerned, we found people very charming and friendly and were invited to a Friday night get together when we had only been there a few days. I think it helps to make an effort to speak to people and then you are more likely to get a friendly response in return. There are great beaches within a 15 minute drive. Try Honolua Bay for fabulous snorkelling, or Ka'anapali and Black Rock for great sand as well as fishes and turtles. About 50 -60 minutes away past South Kihei is Makena State Park with a dreadful approach road and no facilities but with a sheltered black sand beach off which is beautiful coral and turtles. Suffice it to say, it is not our habit to go back to places two years in a row, but it is a measure of our enjoyment and how much we loved everything, we have rebooked the unit for next January to relive the wonderful experience we had this time.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable - we would stay again”
Reviews.Author: JL5627
Reviews.Content: Owner Jackie (Arizona resident) is professional, friendly, and helpful. The location is outstanding, as a medium-size condo within steps of a nice beach beach. We purposely chose this type of condo to avoid the glitzy, massive high- rises, mostly to the south. The A-202 unit was comfortable and has an array of cooking and eating equipment. Like most similar habitation in this area of the Kaanapali coast, the unit relies on sea breeze for cooling. This worked fine, with cross-ventilation, but opening up louvers on the bedroom/street side allows some traffic noise. With experience, this was not bothersome. The gist is that we would stay here again. -- Jack Sanders, Dallas, TX

Reviews.Title: “Return visit even better!”
Reviews.Author: letsctheworld
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hale Mahina unit B105 a few years ago and it was wonderful, so this year we returned. It was even better this time around! The grounds and location of course were still the same WONDERFUL; but it was obvious to us that the owners have done a lot of work in the unit! The bedroom now has beautiful new furniture and a TV. There is a new couch in the living room with a VERY comfortable hide a bed, also a new flat screen TV. The unit is so comfortable, and has everything you would need for your stay. As always Chuck and Mary were wonderful hosts! I'd highly recomend this unit! We can't wait to go back AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation of my life.”
Reviews.Author: RandomCL
Reviews.Content: The condo (A103) was perfect. Nicely updated for a clean and simple stay. Very comfortable furnature and nice appliances. All of your needs are covered. Perfect view from the lanai of the ocean and islands. Very nice pool for when the ocean is too much. The grounds were immaculate with dozens of variety of flowers. Have I mentioned the daily procession of the sea turtles? Turtle watching was just amazing.

Reviews.Title: “Most relaxing vacation we have ever experienced”
Reviews.Author: swim001
Reviews.Content: B-404 was the condo we stayed in. It is decorated very nice. Everything we needed was supplied by the owner. The unit does not have air condition but all rooms have overhead fans plus additional fans that can be used if needed. All the rooms have good ventalation and are very comfotable. We slept like a log. The kitchen was well equiped as we ate in most of the time (18 days) we were there. There are plenty of resturants available a short drive away that have excellent food plus a grocery store near by. There are only 52 units in this complex so it is very quiet. You have an excellent view of the ocean and sunsets from your patio. You do NOT get this in most resorts unless you pay an extravient amount of money. We will be back again and we will recommend B-404 to all of our friends. The owner also has another unit A-307 which we were able to see while we were there. This unit is a one bedroom and is decorated very nicely. We met a couple staying in this unit from Canada and they were very pleased. Their teen age daughters told their parents that this is one of the best places that they have ever stayed. They are coming back in Dec to stay again in this unit. When my wife and I come back by ourselves or with another couple we would stay in A-307. We highly recommend either B-404 or A-307 to anyone that wants to experience paradise. Again, these units have excecellent ocean and sunset views plus a beach, ocean and pool swimming, grass area to relax in in your chase lounges and BBQ's for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, great views, very quiet”
Reviews.Author: mosquitofart
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay at Hale Mahina. I was in room 403B. It was clean, well stocked. We were pleasantly surprised to find spices, condiments, charcoal, snorkeling gear, books etc in our unit. The unit was nicely and recently updated with the exeception of the master bedroom as it didn't appear to be as nicely appointed as the room with the 2 twins, in fact t looked like they didn't finish the remodel up there. I loved the view from our balcony. Some issues I feel compelled to point out: -There was no wireless as stated and the phones didn't work in the unit. No one ever came to fix them. - There were no parking passes in our unit. The vacation manual also said 2 bdrm units were allowed 2 cars but when a parking pass was finally delivered our 3rd day in,only one pass was delivered. - This is a mixed use condo development. It seems like 1/2 the units are for vacationers and the other 1/2 are for owners. The condo manager Larry was very intolerant of noise. Granted it was our first night there and we being loud on our balcony playing cards. At 10:01pm, 1 minute after quiet time Larry was pounding on our door. Instead speaking to us in a calm and collected approach and asking us to turn it down and bring it in, I'd describe Larry as hostile and confrontational. Apparantly he had been trying to call us to turn it down but the unit's phone didn't work. - The electrical wiring in the unit leaves something to be desired as light switches didn't always turn lights off and on, it was a game of hit all the switches multiple times until a light finally came on. - Being on the 4th floor in the upstairs master bedroom it was very hot at night and sleeping was difficult without the fan on high all the time. It didn't ever cool down in that room. Aside from the very quiet, retirement home feel of the place it was nice and a good value. Just beware of what you are looking for in a vacation spot.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful place!”
Reviews.Author: kmblank
Reviews.Content: This is the nicest 2 bedroom condo in this condominium resort! I thought not having air would be an issue but with all the windows and ceiling fans the place was so breezy and we could hear the ocean the whole time. The view, pool, jacquzzi, beachfront and snorkeling excellent. Definitely a great deal here and no expense spared on decor, especially the comfortable beds!! That's so important when you travel- these were comprable to "heavenly beds" at hyatt hotels. There wasn't anything they didn't include in the kitchen, pool needs, etc. Its all here!! We wouldn't change a thing!

Reviews.Title: “This condo is the best - we've stayed twice now”
Reviews.Author: jlketchy
Reviews.Content: I don't believe we could find a much better place to stay. The condo is clean, comfortable, and quiet. Hale Mahina offers everything we need. We always stay on the ground floor; it has a gorgeous lani area with bright flowers, and offers privacy. We are heading May 10th for another wonderful 2-week stay.

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina B206, the Greatest condo on Maui”
Reviews.Author: suzidawg
Reviews.Content: We just completed our 5th year in this condo. It is very clean, roomy and has all of the conveniences of home - we can't imagine staying in any other condo or area. The grounds are beautiful and will maintained. We love having our own private beach and enjoy the snorkling. This year we had several huge turtles sunning themselves and sleeping on the beach. We also enjoy the bar-b-que, pool and spa - so relaxing! We survided the tsunamie which was very interesting. This condo is located in the best area, just a few miles north of Lahina and some of the best island attractions. If your looking for a good time, this is the place to be! We are looking forward to next year!

Reviews.Title: “A-406 Fish Condo - Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: monibug
Reviews.Content: The "Fish" condo was fantastic! We stayed for 2 weeks (Mar,6 - 20th) and were sad to leave. This condo was perfect for us! I didn't feel like a bunch of cheap furniture was thrown together just to rent the place. We had more room then we would have had staying in 2 rooms in a hotel. The condo is nicely decorated and cared for. With a lot of attention to detail. We loved watching the whales and sea turtles right from the beach or lanai. Quite often a turtle would come onto the beach for the day to warm up. Our kids loved this place (ages 10 and 11). The beach is not big but it is private and quiet. My only issue was that the condo complex (Hale Mahina) doesn't offer recycling. This was an issue for us - even our kids. The book "Maui Revealed" was really helpful when it came to planning our excursions. We found the book in the condo, which was great. There are a few rules for the complex but they were not a big deal and the rules are what helps the place stay so nice and clean. The view from the lanai is amazing and hard to beat!! We would definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome location, comfortable accommodations.”
Reviews.Author: davemacuser
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week in Hale Mahina #B304. There are many condos to choose from this resort so make sure you check what each one looks like. We booked through Chase 'N Rainbows, a rental and realty service, so we were able to look at photos of the condo before booking. The resort itself is good - all of the units look out to the ocean, there is a pool (with shower), hot tub, and lawn in front of the beach. The parking was sufficient and the building was clean. There were an awful lot of rules stated concerning guests, garbage, etc. which were OK but presented in a very directed manner. On the plus side, we had no problems with too much noise and the people we met were all very friendly. The unit was comfortable and quite big. The bedroom was nice with a comfortable bed. The bathroom was fine although the sink backed up after our second day. We phoned the rental company and the sink was fixed the same day (before lunch, actually!) and there were no other problems. The kitchen was great - newer appliances, lots of room in the fridge, lots of plates, etc. Laundry facilities were OK - detergent would have been a nice idea - and the dryer was a bit worn. The living room was great - comfortable furniture, stereo, TV, and a nice ceiling fan. Finally, the lanai was a nice size, also included comfortable (not cheap plastic) furniture and we spent a lot of time out there! If you want ocean front for a reasonable charge ($190 US / night) , we would definitely recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina, Unit A106 STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: goaway5
Reviews.Content: This was a great, relaxing place to stay. It was my first time in Honokowai, and it will not be my last. This is an all condo beach resort. Each condo is different, depending on the owner. If you read some of the other reviews, you will see that they differ greatly, due to I believe how much the property owner is involved. I stayed in unit A106 and booked directly thru the property owner. I recommend doing this, When you book thru an agency, they do not know all the details of each condo and you may be disappointed with what you get. This condo was beautifully maintained, decorated and equipped with everything you need for a pleasant stay. I cooked all my meals in the well stocked kitchen, with a mirrored wall to bring the outside in. This is a first floor condo, so the access to the oceanfront if perfect. The beach is very close, with green sea turtles visiting and resting every few days. Also, the location is perfect for whale watching during the season, with a view of the islands of Lanai and Molokai. Also included at this beach resort is a swimming pool and jacuzzi. Next to the pool area, is a small maint. bldg. that has an outside shower, sink and library full of books to borrow. The grounds are beautifully kept, the hibiscus here are just georgous! The resident manager told me that he has a friend that grafts them, and the colors are outstanding. There are barbque grills on site, complimentary internet in the unit, boogie boards, beach chairs, mats and beach towels are also in the unit. Plenty of hot water and a huge closet, but you do not need to bring many clothes because of the washer and dryer in the unit. They have a quiet time here which I really appreciated, betw. 10pm and 7am. This is not a huge, noisy resort, but a wonderful, quiet refuge to relax and unwind. As other reviews have mentioned, the bedroom is on the road side of the unit and if you are not a heavy sleeper, this may be a problem. There is a sofa bed available in the living room, included in one of the most confortable sofas I have sat on. For me, the bed was very comfortable, so I slept there every night and the sound got less noticeable each night. Check out the website, www.mauicondovacation.com and click on Hale Mahina. The photos do not do it justice, it is just beautiful. Stay here, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “"The Best Place in Maui"”
Reviews.Author: Daisy1Wisconsin
Reviews.Content: We visited Hale Mahina 406-A February 13-19, 2010. Our daughter and grandsons were with us, and we had the BEST vacation! It was wonderful to see Hawaii through their eyes, and the "Fish Condo" made it even more special! The condo was the absolute best place we have stayed on Maui (and this was our third visit)..and the best place of all our accomodations. We have visited the islands a total of 4 times, staying in hotels, condos and bed and breakfasts. We would HIGHLY recommend Hale Mahina 406-A to anyone looking for a wonderful place to stay while visiting Maui! We will definately stay in this condo again!

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina B206 = Home-away-from-Home!”
Reviews.Author: JAB611
Reviews.Content: I have had the pleasure of staying at Hale Mahina B206 on several occasions since 2005 and have already made reservations for 2010! The unit is overall outstanding and extremely comfortable; with its in-unit washer/dryer, up-to-date appliances; end-unit perks (breeze, very quiet), great views of the ocean and manicured grounds; and free/plentiful parking! The owners Jim and Lorna are gracious hosts and a pleasure to deal with - Mahalo you two!

Reviews.Title: “Everything was WONDERFUL!”
Reviews.Author: MauiDrmz
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Hale Mahina, Unit B206, three times and have just sent in our deposit for November 2010. This unit has everything we need for a glorious Maui stay! The furnishings and appliances are great, the location is awesome and the price is perfect. The view is spectacular! The only downside I have found is that it does not come with a cook!! LOL We would recommend this unit to anyone!! ~~~~Paul and Debbe Miller, Grand Ledge, MI

Reviews.Title: “A307--lovely ocean waves to wake up to!”
Reviews.Author: JenMoody
Reviews.Content: Stayed in A307 for one week with our 9 month old son. Condo is tastefully decorated and overall quite baby friendly! We just lifted a few things out of reach and steered him away from the three steps inside (it is all slate floors) and we were all good. They have it well stocked with lots of stuff for the beach and everything you need in the kitchen (including some staples such as spices and olive oil etc...though exactly what food staples are there likely depends on who was there before you and what they left behind). Wickedly fast wireless internet connection, cable and stereo. Really, all the comforts of home with the added bonus that you're not at home:) The murphy bed in the living room is amazing...we never slept in the bedroom because you can sleep beside the lanai and listen to the ocean all night. We rented a playpen for our son to sleep in. The view from the lanai is excellent...great place to kickback and enjoy your meals with a view. Grounds are immaculately kept and the pool and jacuzzi are very nice. The condo is beachfront, though the waves tend to come right up to the wall of the private beach-- so lying in the sand gets you wet more often than not (at least in Nov). Very close proximity to many other beaches and not far from Old Lahaina. It is about 45 minutes from the airport, so best to hit Costco on your way in. Other supermarkets are 5 to 10 minutes away (drive) for anything else you may need. Dennis (owner) was great--very communicative and helpful. Overall we would love to stay here again and hope we get the chance to!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Condo, beautifully decorated & furnished, with ocean and sunset views to die for!”
Reviews.Author: OldFolksAtHome
Reviews.Content: We knew that a condo in Hawaii directly on the ocean would be beautiful, but never could have imagined the sunsets and and beautiful ocean views that we would enjoy right from the lanai! We felt so comfortable there, the condo has such a lovely motif. We feel that we could never find a better location to stay in Maui. The Condo dÃ©cor, so fully furnished with everything you need, and the pool and spa right next to the beach is so wonderful and convenient! We will recommend "The Fish Condo" to anyone planning a trip to Maui!!â€�

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina 406A”
Reviews.Author: dlfass
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful condo. It is tastefully furnished and has all the amenities you could possibly imagine for your time in paradise. The location is superb - right on the ocean. Lovely pool, lawn area and sandy beach. We had a wonderful time and thoroughly enjoyed our 15 night stay. Would definitely be back - this is a "gem". Mike and Diane Fass San Rafael, CA

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value.”
Reviews.Author: MariliQuebec
Reviews.Content: Condo B-206 We were in Mauii in August 2009 and we spend 10 days in that condo. It was our second time there (we were at the same condo last year). We came back because we really love that place (all of us). We were surprised to read the bad comments about unit B206. The dishwasher , the fridge and the washing machine were new. The unit is a corner unit. It is breesy and quiet and offers a great view of the sea. The condo was clean and well equiped. It is not new but it is very well kept. The location is great, the complex has an access to a small private beach, the swiimming pool is very clean, the jaccusi too and the ground is really well kept (the manager does a real great job). We hope we will be able to come back again the same complex and the same unit. We were wondering about ants but we did not see any. We asked questions about that before leaving for holiday and the owner answered quickly all our questions.We never had any problem with him.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful- wouldn't stay anywhere else!”
Reviews.Author: woody6977
Reviews.Content: Loved the condo, the grounds and the atmosphere. It was peaceful and so quite. The view from our lanai was fabulous!! We saw giant turtles and mantarays right in front of the condo. We will not ever stay anywhere else!! I can't wait to return to Maui and the Hale Mahina!! We feel blessed to have found the Hale Mahina!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place & great location”
Reviews.Author: yell326
Reviews.Content: My family, husband, 3yr old, 9 mo old, and husband's parents all stayed comfortably in this great condo. The place is decorated cute and really gives you the "Hawaii" feel. The Hale Mahina is a little older but this condo has been renovated and is by far the nicer unit at the complex. A very quiet location right on the beach and you never have to fight for pool space. My husband loved snorkeling right in front of the condo and watching the sea turtles. The only "partially negative" aspect is that there is no AC. The unit has a great cross breeze and many fans that circulate the air, however, we vacationed during a record breaking heat wave and there were no tradewinds...making for some HOT nights. The nights of normal Maui weather were perfectly comfortable and the heat was not an issue.

Reviews.Title: “Perfection”
Reviews.Author: curlytgirly
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Hale Mahina for our honeymoon and we were not disappointed! We will for sure be returning to this resort, hopefully for our first anniversary! We had an opportunity to see a few units while we were there. Most units are redone, however Jon and Jackies unit A 202 is a nice unit, as well as the one we stayed in, A 307. If you are looking for a quiet, beach front property , close to everything, then you are destined to stay at the Hale Mahina!!

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina Beach Resort 406A - An engagement to remember on the Eve of a 30th Birthday”
Reviews.Author: silverangels444
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best piece of realestate on the island of Maui. From the start the condo owners were wonderful to deal with, and they had everything ready for us when we arrived. The Condo is so colorful and happy that you cant help but enjoy yourself. We spent a lot of time on their beautiful beach that ended up in my engagement at sunset with Whales Breaching in the background. And then it hosted my 30th birthday party that started in the condo at 5:30AM. You cant go wrong staying here, I highly recomend it.

Reviews.Title: “An oasis of calm. I could live here”
Reviews.Author: daWoods
Reviews.Content: A202, Hale Mahina. If I could live there full time, I would. We've stayed in this condo 3 times, the latest was the first since Jon & Jackie bought it. Gracious hosts. The condo is perfect, and the view from the lanai will hook you right away. Whales swimming by, turtles and occasionally seals. Small beach, pool and hot tub, resident caretakers who treat the property like it was their own. We'll be back. Thanks Jon & Jackie.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great unit!”
Reviews.Author: letsctheworld
Reviews.Content: The location of the Hale Mahina Beach Resort can't get any better! Sitting by the pool watching whales, the beautiful grounds! This is a quiet complex, perfect for a low key trip. The perfect place to unwind. We stayed in unit B105. EVERYTHING we wanted/needed was provided in the unit! It was VERY clean and comfortable. The owners were very helpful and friendly. We are already planning our return visit. Mahalo to Chuck and Mary for letting us stay in your home!

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina unit B206 a dissapointment”
Reviews.Author: merms3
Reviews.Content: Saying in the write up that this was first class accommodation was a mistake. The racks in the dishwasher were so rusted that you did not want to put your dishes in there to get clean. When we arrived they had left us with no toilet paper and that was the first thing we had to go out to get. The washing machine and dishwasher were void of any buttons to select a type of wash or water temp. They have taken them right out of the machine. Your option was cold. The unit is quite out of date and really needed updating. The fridge was newer and a full size which was good because we had to keep every stitch of food in it. I killed ants every night. Hundreds of them. They could be found in the kitchen on the counter every morning and hundreds on the wall in the living room that I tried to kill every morning and again in the evening. Also a steady stream out on the lanai that you saw crawling towards the windows. The location is great and is so close to the beach but this unit is not somewhere I would recommend. I think maybe other units would be fine at this complex. I would never rent from these people again. I did write them an email after I got home and have had no response. We are not fancy people, but just wanted a nice place to stay. There is more I could complain about but lets just say it put a damper on our holiday. You work hard all year and plan a get away that is suppose to be a big deal and then you get a condo like this with owners that don't seem to care.

Reviews.Title: “Must Book A202!!! 1st Class condo”
Reviews.Author: Rogo4PSU
Reviews.Content: My wife and I got married on Maui on March 10th. After a lot of research we choose A202 at Hale Mahina as the place to stay for our honeymoon. The owners, Jackie and Jon, were great. Words can't express the service that was given to us from the day we had interest in renting the condo. Jackie answered every questions we had. She always went over and above her her duties for us. We couldn't have asked for a better condo/honeymoon. The condo was beautiful in and out. You can't beat the views from the Lanai. The condo has everything you need. Outside the grounds are well maintained and you don't have a lot of people to deal with. I was afraid to write this review because my wife and I are thinking about going back to A202 for our one year anniversary. Bottom line is if you are reading this review stop here and contact Jackie and Jon. You won't find a better condo!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Condo - B306”
Reviews.Author: MelanieWays
Reviews.Content: We stayed in B306 for two wonderful weeks. The condo is beautiful - one of the nicest I've ever stayed in. The location was direct ocean front with a small private beach. The owner is so easy to work with and planned everything you need to have a relaxing time. I've read some complaints regarding children and the management seeming unfriendly but when we were there that didn't seem to be a problem. All the children were well behaved but I never saw the manager hovering around to make sure they stayed that way. I highly recommend this condo. By the way, because of the location in the complex, street noise was not a problem either - and, because it is an end unit, no one is walking by your place in paradise to get to their condo - plus you have windows on the two sides instead of just front and back. Great place to stay and beats a hotel by a mile!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Customer Service, Unfriendly, Not Helpful”
Reviews.Author: nothappyII
Reviews.Content: The customer service sucks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1 Twice I called to ask a few questions before I arrived and they rushed me of the phone, asked what did I want to know in a tone that I was bothering them, and hung up on me twice-both male/female. I am changing my stay to elsewhere before I arrive and do not recommend this place at all-this is how they're treating me now, I can only imagine what would happen once I arrived. Do not stay here!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Hale Mahina Beach Resort Unit A202 - www.alohamahinacondo.com”
Reviews.Author: IchiKafka
Reviews.Content: If anyone is interested in visiting Maui, Hawaii then I would recommend Hale Mahina Beach Resort Unit A202. This my second trip to Hawaii and I must say that I had a far better time during this vacation in comparison to my last one. The condos are located on a private beach and the accommodations are simply wonderful. The owners of the Unit A202 are very informative and helpful. Whenever I needed ideas of what to do the owners were always helpful at giving great ideas. If you want to have a wonderful experience in Hawaii contact www.alohamahinacondo.com.

Reviews.Title: “Condo search was solved with the UNIT!!”
Reviews.Author: takemehome2sandiego
Reviews.Content: First of all, I had certain criteria I was looking for our maui vacation... 1) needed a 2 bedroom that would sleep 5(son took the couch) 2) ON the beach 3)close to Lahaina, near our family 4)Clean and decorated recently 5) free parking 6) WIFI 7) in house washer/dryer 8) beach supplies... and after HOURS ( I mean DAYS and DAYS of searching on here cross checking reviews with vacation rentals by owner websites ) This was the PERFECT place to stay. I would recommend in a heart beat to friends and family. They definitely take care of the grounds and only draw back if your not on the first floor of the condos is that there is no bathroom at the pool. ( yikes if you have to run to the top floor!) They have an elevator in both buildings and also a cart to help you take things in from your car!! (huge help if you just get back from Costco) Linda, one of the co-owners of this unit 406A in building A which is the better of the two but both are good, is the wonderful to work with. Can work with you on last minute trips too! They have the place decorated adorable yet comfortable. TOP OF THE LINE BEDS, super comfy! Only draw back is the sounds do carry to the loft style masterbed room above the living room and if family is watching tv or playing games, dad won't be able to. But the plus of this is you can see the ocean from your bed and hear the waves crash on the beach all night long. Definitely get the ISLAND feel and sound and smell here. When we arrived and stepped out of our car, we smelled the sweet smell of pineapples! This Unit also stocks a great kitchen with everything you could need for cooking and VERY ORGANIZED! Bottom line if you are staying in the West Maui area and want a quality unit without the hassle of the high rise style places and high end prices, this is the perfect place.

Reviews.Title: “Condo A202--the best”
Reviews.Author: luvthegrape
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Maui and we feel so fortunate that we were referred to Jon & Jackie and their beautiful condominium (A202) at the Hale Mahina. It is a one-bedroom unit, and is very nicely appointed in the decor of the locale. The pictures we saw on their website were not an overstatement of the appearance and quality of the unit. It is well stocked with nearly every item you might need. We made much use of the Ipod dock (There is also a nice flat screen TVâ€”but we were hooked on sunsets!). The best part, though, is the ocean. The lanai looks directly out onto the ocean. The view includes the following: three tall palms, sunsets, spouting and diving whales, a private beach, a well-manicured lawn and grounds, sailboats, kayakers, and a private beach. Sounds of the ocean waves can be easily heard in the condo because the ocean shoreline is about 30 feet from the building. We were so pleased. Hale Mahina is in a great location. We drove north 10 minutes or so to snorkel in Honoluau Bay (only 5 minutes to eat dinner at Royâ€™s). Driving 5 minutes south, we enjoyed the beach at the Kaanapali resorts; 5 minutes more to Lahainaâ€”many great restaurants, the harbor for whale watch departs, and shopping. There is a Farmerâ€™s Market in walking distance from the condo. We really enjoyed our stay on Maui and our accommodations added much to our experience.

Reviews.Title: “Much better than a hotel!”
Reviews.Author: soitz
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights in A307 over New Year's. The unit recently changed owners, but we had no issue due to the change. We chose this unit because of its decor - no cheesy Hawaiian prints or rattan furniture. It's more modern and Asian/Polynesian in decor. The unit is at the end of the building with only one unit on the side and one above, so was very quiet as far as neighbors were concerned. The noise from traffic on the main road was too much in the bedroom though, so we moved out to the Murphy bed in the living room after the first night. This was a big improvement, since then all we heard was the sound of the ocean at night, which was very relaxing. The owners provided lots of beach gear (nice snorkel equipment, beach chairs and umbrellas, soft-sided coolers, etc.) but strangely enough no beach towels. This is a problem because the maid service who provides the bath towels prohibits them from being taken to the pool or beach (we did anyway since we had no alternative). Oh, and there is fantastic snorkeling right off the beach in front of the building (we saw a cornetfish and an octopus!). You can contact the owner and see pictures of the unit at www.onthebeachinmaui.com.

Reviews.Title: “Heavenly”
Reviews.Author: offwegoMichigan
Reviews.Content: My husband and I traveled with another couple to the Hale Mahina Beach Resort. We are all retired and in our late fifties and early sixties. We loved this condo resort! We stayed in unit B-402. It was gorgeous with leather furniture, beautiful artwork, and a gourmet kitchen. The unit was spotless and had all of the amenities needed for a relaxing time. The resort is mostly inhabited by seniors and is managed by a wonderfully responsible man named Larry. He can be seen early each morning cleaning the pool and the grills. He even swept items off the grass! What a gem!! Hale Mahina has a beautiful view of the ocean and surrounding islands. The palm trees and meticulous landscaping make it a true vacationer's paradise. You cannot go wrong by staying here. My only regret is that our vacation ended too soon!!

Reviews.Title: “For a quiet, serene Maui experience, Hale Mahina was excellent!”
Reviews.Author: CarolEPBayarea_CA
Reviews.Content: My sister won an all expenses paid trip, and we stayed at the Hale Mahina. It's condos, and we were maybe 50 feet from the beach. Overall, the experience was wonderful, couldn't be better for what we wanted, which was a quiet, relaxing time in Maui, the first trip for us both. Sleeping: Ours was a ground floor condo, and was equipped with a single bedroom and a hide-a-bed in the living room. My sister took the master bedroom, and said the bed was very comfortable. I just slept on the couch, rather than fold out the hide-a-bed; I've yet to sleep on a comfortable hide-a-bed, but the couch was quite comfy, with the added bonus that I listened to pounding surf all night and had the breezes coming through all night. Bliss! View: we had a lovely view from our condo and from the green in front of it. The condo sits on a kind of embankment, and the beach is below that. We had a patio, made sort of private by the plants and flowers planted around it, but still providing a lovely view. People in the upper three stories had balconies to sit on and enjoy the view, which included the island of Lanai on the left, and Molokai on the right. Every morning, the sun would come up behind us, and Molokai, which always got some morning rain, had gorgeous rainbows. And of course the sunsets were lovely. Location: Hale Mahina is listed as being in Lahaina, but it's actually several minutes north of it, in a quieter, more residential, and less tourist-schlocky place. Yet, not too far from Lahaina, should you want to go there for restaurants and the aquarium or shopping, and only about 45 minutes (along some lovely coastal scenery - mainly beaches) in to the airport at Wailuku. An easy trek to the famous Highway to Hana. And beaches galore for swimming and snorkeling, all along that area. Amenities: we had a full kitchen, a nice bath with separate vanity/sink area, a washer and dryer, and in the kithcen, a completely equipped kitchen with all we could need to cook meals, including a microwave, toaster, blender, dishwasher, cookware, silverware and plates, cups, glasses, etc. There were even paper towells, scribbies, dish soap and laubdry soap - pretty much all we could need except the food, which we picked up at the Costco on the way from the airport. Flat screen TV and cable, DVD, etc. When we needed staff, we found the manager very friendly and helpful. The Hale Mahina has a pool and a hot tub, and it seems to be a place more suited for people who are not looking to party, but to relax in the sun or shade, read a book, swim in the ocean or the pool, or barbecue (outdoor grills provided). The pool has a sink and a shower, but it there's a sign that indicates no rowdiness at the pool permitted, so if you're looking for a place that your kids can play loudly, as kids like to do, this may not be the best place for you. Swimming, snorkeling, etc: The beach is nice - the tide does come pretty high in, and the surf is roughish, but you can touch the bottom for a very long distance out, and so my sister and I, and lots of others there, swam a lot quite safely. There's rocky areas here and there, and the BEST purchase we made before going there was reef shoes. Those rocks are lava, very abrasive, and I cut my toe the very first time I went out (having not bothered with the reef shoes yet - mistake). We didn't get to go snorkeling, sad to say, but lots did - though we were told better snorkeling areas were to the south and north of us. But in the rocky areas, sea turtles come in to feed on the algae, and we saw some. Altogether, it was a wonderful place to stay! Lovely landscaping and foliage, well kept, clean, in good repair...just a nice place.

Reviews.Title: “Totatally Awesome Condo!!”
Reviews.Author: scrapper137
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a great place to stay with an awesome ocean view - look know father. We went as a family. There were five of us. We have grown children, youngest is 22 years old. We needed a vacation. We lost (5)immediately family member(s),co-workers and friends to death. Our family dog was also diagnosed with Lyme disease, all this in four short months. I planned this vacation for us. I researched the reviews,read them all. First thing our sons said when we walked in the condo; it is even better than the website showed. We were extremely impressed. The view from the lania breath taking! This condo is nicely decorated. Our favorite thing to do at the condo was eat on the lanai. The family choose to eat at the condo on the lania instead of going out to eat because it was so beautiful. The condo was a perfect size for us. It was a joy to cook in the condo and I loved the part that I could set a beautiful table scape with everything matching(very colorful). No worries the condo has a dishwasher. One concern we had was that it didn't have air conditioning. "You do not need it ,really" Owners are right with the sky lights and the fans it was very comfortable. With the ocean and the trade winds it was very comfortable. The average temp while we were there was 80. Larry the resident manager was very helpful when asking any questions we had. Told us about a very nice beach 2 miles away. Larry keeps the grounds immaculate. What you see on the internet is what it really is and better. He really cares about the property,and it shows. There is alot of good reviews for two very specific condos there. But our family recommends condo unit A 406 hands down with out a doubt. The owner was very pleasant to work with, extremely nice, very helpful.Very graious,and kind. Our grown children loved it 22y,23y,25. What more do I have to say. We loved it also. The sunsets were awesome from the lanai!! It also has a "great location". We already have friends interested and checking it out. The only thing now, is that the secret is out we won't be able to get the condo when we want it. We Love Maui, and we loved our condo. What are you waiting for?

Reviews.Title: “Going to Maui - Stay here!”
Reviews.Author: canadian-eh777
Reviews.Content: WOW - this condo was fantastic. Perfect location - right on the beach. Overlooked the ocean. Could not be much closer. We ate all our meals on the balcony. The condo was nicely decorated. The owners took great care. There was an updated kitchen much better than our own. This condo had 2 bedrooms - one king bed and bathroom on 2nd floor. You could see the ocean from the bed. This room you could hear the ocean waves. Very relaxing. There was an overhead fan which was needed. The condo is on the 4th floor. The place has an elevator and excellent parking. The 2nd bedroom was nicely decorated but was was a bit noisy from street noise. The was an L shaped couch which also had a pull out. Which we used. We had the patio open all the time. The weather was 80-90F all the time with a nice breeze. There was a TV and DVD player. The beach was private. Not much for fish right at the condo but a short swim there was some you could see. We did not swim much right at this beach but went other places to swim/ snorkel and play in the waves. This was really not a problem. The pool and spa was excellent. We spent a lot of time there. The pool was a good temperature and the spa was nice and hot. The landlord looking after the condo was excelent at keeping everything perfect. Even picked up leaves on the grass. Any problem or question and he was right there. We ventureed up the coast for much better snorkling. We determined this area was the best area to stay in Maui so you cannot go wrong. In fact you cannot go wrong with this Condo. I have nothing negative to say. Going to Maui - you stay here! We found this condo on VRBO and the condo 1was 36091. Have fun... we wish we could go back!

Reviews.Title: “Unit needed renovation”
Reviews.Author: MonetteBothellWA
Reviews.Content: Loved the views of Molokai,Lanai and the whales. Lovely grounds. Large lanai close to the ocean. Our unit was is serious need of updating. Old stained carpet, old appliances. Needed a good cleaning. Didn't have basice cooking utensils. The dryer took TWO hours to dry a towel. The manager was surly and unhelpful. The residents were unfriendly and didn't share the facilities. We could hardly take the charcoal BBQ fumes filling our condo every evening. Try propane.

Reviews.Title: “Great view”
Reviews.Author: blissali
Reviews.Content: Love Unit A202! It's clean and homey with a spectacular view. We stayed at another condo during our first week and wished we could have stayed here instead for the whole duration of our honeymoon/vacation. The owners, Jackie and Jon, left us a gift basket which was quite thoughtful and truly appreciated. We love Maui and there were so many things to do, so we really didn't get to enjoy "our home." I told my husband that I want to come back to Maui and stay at the same unit for a longer period of time.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely oceanfront view”
Reviews.Author: traveler1025md
Reviews.Content: We got a 2nd floor unit at Hale Mahina in building B. The oceanfront view was very lovely, being accented by the lush landscaping of the facility. The beach was a little bit narrow. It is secluded and is not crowded. If you want crowded beaches, which I preferred on some of the days that we stayed, we went to Napili, Kapalua, Kaanapili and Hana beaches. The only thing that I would prefer Hale Mahina to have is a new coat of building paint. The cluster of condominiums in Lower Honoapiilani Rd are dated, so a new paint would make Hale Mahina a standout. Other than that, my unit was well kept, clean and it has all the things that i needed in the kitchen. We seldom ate out. We bought groceries from the Star Market and cooked all our dinners except for our dinner luau. The unit has folding chairs and beach umbrellas which became handy when we visited all the other beaches. It rained every dawn, but by sunrise, everything is clear and it is totally cloudless, which is very good for walking along the tiny road at the back of the condominium. You can walk to farmer's markets, the fresh market and all sorts of tiny stores, including the famous ABC stores.

Reviews.Title: “Unit A202 is the best!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sherryn68
Reviews.Content: After searching many places, I stumbled upon this condo and had read someone else's reviews on this one particular unit, Unit A202, and went directly to their website. We stayed there from May 4-12, 2008. This is a SPECTACULAR place!!!! I am a neat freak, and feel that when one person says that a place is clean, it never seems to be up to par as to what I would say. You can book directly on their website - www.alohamahinacondo.com This is an amazing 1 bedroom, queen bed, full bath unit with the most awesome view of the ocean!! It has ceramic tile floors and stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. This is a 2nd story unit (there is an elevator) with a huge lanai with double doors leading out. They provide everything imaginable in their kitchen, washer and dryer, tv, tub/shower (water pressure is great!), and all the little amenities that you would think you would've packed and forgot (beach towels.....thank you!). This has the nicest decor and a small beach, pool, jacuzzi, and great snorkeling right outside your door!! I can't say enough about it and hope you at least go to their website, where you can see the pics (which don't really do it enough justice) and availability. You won't be disappointed, and the location to everything is great!! You are only 5 minutes away from Lahaina and there is little shops and a 24 hour grocery store right up the street. We traveled almost completely around the island, and went to numerous beaches during our stay, but by the end of the day, we were glad to go "home", which is what it became.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Condo, Perfect Vacation!!”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel1302
Reviews.Content: Four of us stayed at the Hale Mahina from April 16 to April 25, 2008. We had a top floor unit in bldg B (I think it was B, when you pull into the parking lot it is on the right side). Our unit was perfect, it was 2 bedrooms, one in the back of the unit and one upstairs in a loft with a second bathroom. The view from the lanai was unbelievable. It was so relaxing in the morning to sit out there and drink your coffee and then in the evening to have a few drinks and watch the whales right out in front. The pool area was beyond clean, the property manager is out every morning and evening to make sure everything is put away in its proper place and cleaned. The pool does close kind of early (9:30 I believe) but we were usually ready for bed by 10:30 anyways! My only complaint would be the noise in the back bedrooms.The traffic going by is kind of loud and the garbage truck in the morning sounded like it was coming into our room! My husband and I just happened to have earplugs with us which we used after the first night and that helped a ton.

Reviews.Title: “A202 is Paradise”
Reviews.Author: frdrices
Reviews.Content: We stayed in A202 Hale Mahina Condo twice and would never go to the Hawiian Islands and stay anywhere else. This visit we were married on the private beach just outside the condo. As you walk into this beautiful condo, you can see straight through to the ocean through the oversized glass slider door to the lanai. It is so close to the ocean, you can hear the waves at night as you sleep. To sit on the lanai in the morning over Kona coffee is an instant de-stresser and a great way to start your day. You can sit there in the morning and watch the whales through the naked eye. The condo itself is beautiful and immaculate. The kitchen is completely modern with granite counters, stainless steel appliances and I could go on and on. Book directly through the owners as they are awesome people and know a great deal about the island. The complex is very well maintained with a sparkling pool and very warm jacuzzi which we used every night. If you want the most romatic week possible, I would recommend this condo. IT'S GREAT.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it!”
Reviews.Author: islandinthesun569
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at hale mahia beach resort, we made the mistake of booking through one of the larger rental companies, While we were there I learned that you can actually book through some of the owners. And the units that are privately rented seemed to be much nicer then the larger company rented ones. None the less the stay was amazing. The amenities were fantastic, the pool was clean as can be and the beach was within steps from the condo.,, not to mention the bbqs and the nice grass lounging area. In fact we were fortunate enough to be at the resort during a young couples wedding on March 31st. It was absolutely gorgeous I even cried. The had someone blow the conch shell and a musician playing the guitar for part and the flute, I only wish I had his name! my fiancÃ© and I were so inspired by this wedding we decided that ours will be there! We asked around trying to get information on who had planned this beautiful wedding. We found out that it was actually a lady who owns unit A202! Her name is Jackie Pizinger. I was given her contact info by someone in the wedding party.
